entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Steinbach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
